Cross-election consistency check

Source: R/diagnostics-ecological.R
plot_ecological.Rd

Compares tract-level results between two election years to check whether spatial patterns are consistent.

Usage

plot_ecological(
  result,
  result2,
  variable = NULL,
  type = c("scatter", "map"),
  ...
)

Arguments

result

An interpElections_result object.

result2

A second interpElections_result object (different year).

variable

Variable name to compare. NULL auto-matches by party.

type

Character. "scatter" or "map". Default: "scatter".

...

Ignored.

Value

A ggplot object (invisibly).

On this page
